about_the_game:
This Moonlight Exploration DLC experience features a full moon and awe-inspiring starry expanse framing these ancient monuments, is truly magical and a bit eerie at the same time!

While Riddle of the Sphinx™ is set during the daytime — under the intense heat of the sun — this DLC unlocks new, never-before-seen exploration in and around the Giza Plateau, Great Sphinx, and Great Pyramid Necropolis (area outside of the Great Pyramid) under a mysterious moonlit canopy of stars.

The Moonlight Exploration DLC also features a new musical piece of a haunting Duduk as you explore the Sphinx at night.

Plus, you can fly Gil's helicopter at night and experience the Great Pyramid and Giza Sphinx from a bird's eye view!
